form.p:
Hit F1 to toggle help.
Hit F2 to toggle console.
Use the controls at right, and see their actions logged in the console.

Application controls are:
ESC to toggle cursor from desktop to game mode.
W,S for forwards and back.
A,D for left and right.
blank, X for up and down.
In game mode (cross cursor):
Turn eye on mouse.
In desktop mode (arrow cursor):
Turn eye on mouse down.
Forwards on both buttons.
